channel.title: How much space does Virtual Box take up?
channel.description:
If im installing linux into virtualbox, would it take up alot of room?
i got 52GB free space.

item.title: How much space does Virtual Box take up?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Check my thread in linux.

I have a WRT54GS, and i typed the commands mopman said into the terminal, and he said i needed a b43-fwcutter and it would work, but it was already installed and i have no clue what to do…

Read full topic

item.title: How much space does Virtual Box take up?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

52GB, that enough for linux on VB?

thats plenty.

Read full topic
item.source: How much space does Virtual Box take up?

item.title: How much space does Virtual Box take up?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:6, topic:215375”][quote author=Frell link=topic=283089.msg2297665#msg2297665 date=1214460978]

It can have a dynamically expanding virtual hard drive, so as long as you’ve got enough space for the distro, you should be fine.

Is there a way to check the total empty space on your comp?

lol’d

I never do, but lol, you just select the C drive, im stupid

52GB, that enough for linux on VB?
[/quote]
yes, but why didnt you just try before asking here? or google?
i mean SERIOUSLY WHAT THE FUCK[/quote]
Dont want to screw up something, and ubuntu wont be done downloading for 49 minutes.

Read full topic
item.source: How much space does Virtual Box take up?
